scripts.docgen:all: npm run docgen:crud && npm run docgen:extends
scripts.prepublishOnly: lerna run build --scope */ui-* --scope @fast-crud/fast-crud --scope @fast-crud/fast-extends && npm run before-build
scripts.publish: chcp 65001 && npm run prepublishOnly  && lerna publish --conventional-commits && npm run copylogs
scripts.before-build: chcp 65001 && cd ./packages/ui/ui-interface && date /t >build.md && git add ./build.md && git commit -m "build: prepare to build"
scripts.no-push: lerna publish --no-push --conventional-commits && lerna publish && npm run copylogs
scripts.checkout:main: git checkout main && cd ./packages/fast-admin/fs-admin-element && git checkout main && cd ../fs-admin-antdv && git checkout main  && cd ../fs-admin-naive-ui && git checkout main && cd ../../
scripts.checkout:dev: git checkout dev && cd ./packages/fast-admin/fs-admin-element && git checkout dev && cd ../fs-admin-antdv && git checkout dev  && cd ../fs-admin-naive-ui && git checkout dev && cd ../../
